com.sterlingcommerce.ui.logging

Class SCUILoggerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.logging.SCUILoggerHelper

  • public class SCUILoggerHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    SCUILoggerHelper class contains different functional names used to create a slf4j logger. If no functional name is given default framework logger name is used. The separate logger helps control the logging based on the functional package using the properties file or xml. rasrinivasan

      • getLogger

        public static org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(java.lang.String loggerName)
        This method returns the named logger. If the given name is null it returns the logger for FRAMEWORK_LOGGER_NAME. loggerName of the type String of type Logger
